mapper.insert: insert into song_list (id, song_id, song_title, song_singer, song_url, song_comment_count, song_flag,new_comment_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songSinger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songCommentCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),#{newCommentCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, song_id, song_title, song_singer, song_url, song_comment_count, song_flag,new_comment_count from song_list
select id, song_id, song_title, song_singer, song_url, song_comment_count, song_flag,new_comment_count from song_list where song_flag = '0'
